author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
The festive season fast approaches and with it comes the eternal struggle that is figuring out what to gift your friends and loved ones (or, what to put on your own wishlist). Here at Grimdark Magazine we’ve put our heads together to come up with a few ideas that might fit the bill for grimdark […]

The post Killing Them with Kindness: A Grimdark Gift Guide appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: Killing Them with Kindness: A Grimdark Gift Guide
